payload.message: Pre-market memory load. Read skills/kaizen/references/market-flush-protocol.md Pre-Market section. Clear HIPPOCAMPUS.md of all yesterday's data. Fetch fresh GEX/vanna levels. Check economic calendar for today. Write regime hypothesis. If market is closed today (holiday), skip and reply NO_REPLY.

Post-open assessment. Read skills/kaizen/references/market-flush-protocol.md Post-Open section. Update HIPPOCAMPUS.md with actual regime from first 30 min. Was the pre-market hypothesis correct? Log any positions. Note any surprising flow. If market is closed today, reply NO_REPLY.

Midday flush. Read skills/kaizen/references/market-flush-protocol.md Midday section. Write morning trade log to daily notes with salience tags. Compress HIPPOCAMPUS.md â€” remove stale morning context. Check live positions. Has regime changed? Check context % â€” if >60% flush aggressively. If market is closed today, reply NO_REPLY.

EOD flush. Read skills/kaizen/references/market-flush-protocol.md EOD section. Write all remaining positions and P&L to daily notes. Tag every trade with salience. Write EOD summary. Clear HIPPOCAMPUS.md to clean template state. If market was closed today, reply NO_REPLY.

Nightly sleep consolidation. Read skills/kaizen/references/sleep-consolidation.md and follow all 5 phases. Also read skills/kaizen/references/market-flush-protocol.md Sleep section for market-specific additions.
